Text.Page:
One of the villagers, {@LinkCreature:249#1018}, hurried to the Eastern Teleport Platform. He's impatient and anxious to study the argons, but he's as deadly as rotten fruit.

Please, head to the platform and do what you can to help him. I need people with his courage.
You're here to help? Outstanding. I hoped they'd send me a bodyguard.
